answers.answer: Adding, I also snore loudly (for past 5 yrs) and have sleep apnea .. I use MAD (Madibular advancement device) started using it past 3-4 months .. it does make my snoring better.
Can someone please help me with my issues. Please let me know. Thanks much
Im trying to get more insight into the problem and more research. If any one is not very busy ...

Hi, I recently did a water fasting and that was difficult in the first couple of days but I lost some weight, can breath easier and feel better and calm now. There is also some data that water fasting is also useful for people suffering from diabetes type 2 (but it's absolutely contraindicated for diabetes type 1!)So perhaps you might consider trying a supervised water fasting course?

Hello,Sexual problem or weakness is also known as erectile dysfunction. The causes are many like diabetes, depression, autonomic nervous system problem, excessive alcohol ingestion or tobacco smoking etc. You may need to consult your doctor to see which amongst these causes are responsible for your problem. Even prediabetes can cause erectile dysfunction. This does not usually need drugs to be controlled and glucose levels can be brought under control with good exercise and diet control.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

If someone knows are these pills at liquor stores safe for use?  Anyway, now during wathcing porn I might get erections (not very hard like before) which last for sometime (5-15 mins) and then go soft and again I might get some semi hard erection ... but I will get only semi soft erection during sex with a girl if I dont use the pills. I have used pills for about 6-7 times after my feb2013 episode of going soft. I cannot anymore get hard by grinding, or just making out with a girl after the feb2013 incident. I had been a pre-diabetic in early 2012 but I got under control in six months with strict diet and exercise. But in early 2013 once I got that gorgeous girl I was eating again normal ... and after her break up .. have been eating a lot of junk also .. just to put on weight and look big (now my weight 197 lbs). I was about 160 lbs in early 2013 when with my GF.  I just checked my blood sugar again now i am getting consistent fasting blood sugar readings over 100 ..so I am again back to pre-diabetic. I have made changes already.Anyway, ,my question .. title: Erectile Dysfunction (ED) Pre-diabetes 29 year old
